Posts.Content: Jun 7, 2011 07:42PM peetie wrote: i bet you have hundreds of prayers including mine. i am new at this too and real scared. i found out may 31 i have IDC and am supposed to go for a breast mri with dye to make sure thats all i have and my nodes are ok. its the hurry up and then wait for the call.  my biggest woory after will it come back is i have never been able to tolerate any kind of hormones or estrogens my whole life and now to find out i have to be on them for 5 years or more is awful to me.  i am a small busted woman post menapausal for 9 years now and the doc wants to see if she can just do a lumpectomy and leave enough of me, to not look as she put it, like a big animal took a bite out of me.  in that case she would remove the rest and i would be fitted ahead of time for an implant. i dont know if they spare your nipple or does the inplant come with one?//  lost of questions.  sounds vaine but since we are all going to pull through, we have to look ahead, right?  i like to run around on 95 degree days at home with a t-shirt and no bra or go to a party twice a year witha push up bra on to look like i have at least a B instead of an A.  every try to find a bra size 40 A?  impossible! thanks for letting me in  took me forever!
